description:
Google, for many, is the homepage of, and gateway to, the internet, but there's plenty you probably don't know about this not-so-simple search engine.

Day after day you hammer out search after search, overlooking not only the hidden gems lurking beneath the surface, but the very thing that makes Google such an anomaly amongst the world's biggest companies - its sense of humour. Here are a few thinks you might not have known you can do in Google.

This is the first ever course for Google Search. This Google Search Tips & Tricks course is created from student point of view.

Learn Google Search Tips & Tricks course is practically example based, Useless stuffs are not included in it. Once you done with the course it will be beneficial for you to get knowledge about how to search properly on Google.

Once you take this course you will get Lifetime Access to this Google Search Tips & Tricks course, You need to pay only once.

What are you going to learn through this Google Search Tips & Tricks course?

- Over 34 Secret lectures and more than 1 hour of Google Search content.

- Practical Google Search Tips & Tricks examples.

- Leaning of all important secrets in easiest way.

Which are the benefits of learning online?

Basically Online Learning is the easiest way of learning things. There are plenty of benefits of learning online includes :

- Student can learn from anywhere irrespective of it’s location.

- Student Learn it from his/her own computer or mobile or tablet device.

- Online education allows for the attendance of class wherever the student has access to the Internet. Online learning is, in many cases, available 24 hours a day and seven days a week, so the student can participate in class whenever it's most convenient.

- Students also save money as online courses are in low price.

- An independent approach to distance learning teaches the student to be a more effective time manager. With online learning, a student may develop the technological skills needed in their future careers.

- Online Learning provides Variety of programs and courses at same place.

What are the basic requirements?

- You need to have computer or Laptop or iPad or Tablet or Any Mobile device.

- Internet Connection.

What is the target audience?

- Complete beginners.

- For College Students.

- Curious about Google Search.

- Computer students.

How long will this Google Search Tips & Tricks course take to complete ?

- It will take just 1 hour to learn Google Search Tips & Tricks.

Why to take this Google Search Tips & Tricks course?

- To have basic knowledge about Google Search & it’s tools
title: Google Search Tips & Tricks for Newbie
